Files: src/compiler/wasm-call-descriptors.{h,cc}, src/wasm/wasm-linkage.h
Symbols and roles:
- compiler::WasmCallDescriptors (class): Factory for CallDescriptors used by wrappers.
  - GetBigIntToI64Descriptor(bool needs_frame_state): Returns cached CallDescriptor for BigInt→i64 builtin, with or without framestate. 32-bit builds also provide lowered pair descriptors and GetLoweredCallDescriptor.
  - ctor(AccountingAllocator*): Initializes Zone and descriptors using compiler::GetBuiltinCallDescriptor(Builtin::kBigIntToI64 or kBigIntToI32Pair, StubCallMode::kCallBuiltinPointer, optionally with framestate).
- wasm-linkage.h: ABI constants and helpers used by wrappers and call descriptors.
  - kGpParamRegisters/kGpReturnRegisters/kFpParamRegisters/kFpReturnRegisters: per-arch register tables for wasm calling convention.
  - kWasmInstanceDataParameterIndex: implicit instance data parameter index (and its register), used by GetWasmCallDescriptor and int64 lowering.
  - kGenericJSToWasmWrapperParamBufferMaxSize: sizing constant for generic JSToWasm conversion buffer.
  - LinkageAllocator/LinkageLocationAllocator: helpers to allocate registers/stack slots for params/returns; used to build call descriptors.
- Integration points:
  - wrappers call compiler::GetWasmCallDescriptor(zone, sig, WasmCallKind, needs_frame_state) to form TSCallDescriptor/TF Call operators; WasmCallKind::kWasmIndirectFunction for internal-function trampolines.
  - BigIntToI64 conversion in FromJS uses WasmCallDescriptors::GetBigIntToI64Descriptor(needs_frame_state), targeting Builtin::kBigIntToI64 or kBigIntToI32Pair on 32-bit.
explanation: This indexes the call descriptor layer and ABI helpers underpinning wrapper calls and BigInt conversions. It links the wrapper builder’s use of GetWasmCallDescriptor and the WasmCallDescriptors factory to architecture-specific ABI tables in wasm-linkage.h.
